title: 86/250/EEC: Commission Decision of 5 May 1986 establishing the amendments to be made in respect of potatoes for consumption to the measures taken by Denmark to protect itself against the introduction of Corynebacterium sepedonicum (Only the Danish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 5 May 1986
establishing the amendments to be made in respect of potatoes for consumption to the measures taken by Denmark to protect itself against the introduction of Corynebacterium sepedonicum
(Only the Danish text is authentic)
(86/250/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Denmark shall amend the 'Landbrugsministeriets bekendtgorelse nr. 395 om konsumkartofler' of 1985 in such a way that potatoes for consumption may be imported into Denmark from other Member States as long as, and under the same conditions as, potatoes for consumption of other sources are allowed for marketing in Denmark.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Denmark.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 May 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 180, 14. 7. 1980, p. 30.
